Package ex4

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Ex4_GUI
    This interface represents a simple GUI drawer which uses StdDraw to draw a gui_shape_collection.
    GUI_Shape  
    GUI_Shape_Collection
    This interface represents a collection of gui_shapes with the following capabilities: 1.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ex4
    This class is the "main" class which will be constructed and run as in (Test_Ex4).
    Ex4_Const
    This class represents a set of parameters for Ex3 GUI Shape application for: Introduction to Computer Science 2020, Ariel University.
    GUIShape  
    Shape_Collection
    This class represents a collection of GUI_Shape.
    Shape_Comp
    This class represents a Comparator over GUI_Shapes - as a linear order over GUI_Shapes.
    StdDraw
    The StdDraw class provides a basic capability for creating drawings with your programs.
